      • concreteClass

        public static <T,C extends T> java.lang.Class<C> concreteClass(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        If the class is concrete, return it. Else, try to find a well known subclass
        Type Parameters:
        T - The specified class type
        C - The resulting class type
        Parameters:
        clazz - The specified class
        Returns:
        The class if it is concrete, or a well-known subclass.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The specified class is abstract (or interface) and not a well-known one
